title: Midnight Basketball Open Run
description: Open gym for students to play casual five-on-five games, meet new teammates, and get some late-night cardio in a relaxed environment.

title: Finals Week Study Jam
description: Quiet group study space with snacks, coffee, and printing help. Tutors will be available for quick questions in math, writing, and computer science.

title: Campus Winter Social
description: A casual mixer with music, photo booth, and hot chocolate bar where students can unwind, socialize, and connect before heading into the break.

title: Intramural Soccer Scrimmage
description: Pick-up soccer match for all skill levels on the main field. Equipment is provided; just bring running shoes or cleats and a water bottle.

title: Library Late-Night Review Session
description: Extended library hours with quiet and group zones. Peer mentors will roam to help answer last-minute questions about exams and projects.

title: Student Art Pop-Up Gallery
description: One-night showcase of student drawings, photography, and digital art in the student union. Light refreshments served and artists available to discuss their work.

title: Career Services Drop-In Coaching
description: Short one-on-one appointments focused on resume reviews, LinkedIn profiles, and internship search strategies with career coaches.

title: Esports Lab Open Play Night
description: Students can reserve gaming stations, join friendly tournaments, or spectate matches in titles like Valorant, Rocket League, and League of Legends.

title: Campus Choir Holiday Performance
description: The campus choir presents a short program of seasonal music in the auditorium, open to all students and guests.

title: First-Gen Student Meet and Greet
description: A welcoming space for first-generation students to connect, share experiences, and learn about campus resources and mentorship opportunities.

title: Data Structures Review Workshop
description: Peer-led review for data structures covering lists, trees, graphs, and common exam patterns. Bring notes and questions.

title: Yoga and Mindfulness Session
description: Gentle yoga and guided breathing exercises designed to help students manage stress and improve focus before exams.

title: Evening Campus Walking Tour
description: Student guides lead a relaxed evening walk around campus landmarks, sharing fun history and hidden study spots.

title: Study Abroad Information Table
description: Drop by the info table to learn about semester abroad options, scholarships, and application timelines from advisors.

title: Pick-Up Volleyball Night
description: Casual volleyball games in the rec center. No team required; players will be grouped on arrival.

title: Community Service Packing Party
description: Help assemble care kits for a local shelter. All materials supplied; students only need to sign in and participate.

title: STEM Tutoring Power Hour
description: Intensive drop-in tutoring focused on calculus, chemistry, and introductory programming before finals.

title: Open Mic Night at the Union
description: Students can perform music, poetry, comedy, or spoken word in a supportive, low-pressure environment.

title: Women in Tech Networking Meetup
description: Casual networking event for women and allies in computing, with lightning talks and mentor introductions.

title: Residence Hall Movie Night
description: Free movie screening with popcorn in the residence hall lounge. Students vote on the film at the start.

title: Finals De-Stress Dogs
description: Therapy dogs visit campus so students can take a break, pet friendly dogs, and recharge between study sessions.

title: Student Startup Pitch Practice
description: Founders can practice short pitches and receive structured feedback from entrepreneurship center staff and peers.

title: Tabletop Games Evening
description: Board games and card games available in the lounge, with staff helping match players to games and groups.

title: Late-Night Coffee and Cram
description: Study space in the student union with free coffee, snacks, and quiet background music to support focused work.

title: Campus Photo Walk
description: Group walk to capture winter campus photos. Open to all skill levels and camera types, including phones.
